                              UPnPProtocol

The UPnP Device discovery udp multicast twisted protocol.

Method Details

__init__(self, *args, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

Init the protocol, no parameters needed.
Overrides:
__builtin__.object.__init__

datagramReceived(self, dgram, address)

This is private, handle the multicast answer from the upnp device.
Overrides:
twisted.internet.protocol.AbstractDatagramProtocol.datagramReceived

search_device(self)

Triggers a UPnP device discovery.

The returned deferred will be called with the UPnPDevice that has been found in the LAN.
Returns:
A deferred called with the detected UPnPDevice instance.
           (type=twisted.internet.defer.Deferred)

_on_discovery_failed(self, err)

Called when the UPnP Device discovery has failed.

The callback returned in search_device is called with an error, corresponding to the cause of the failure.

_on_discovery_timeout(self)

Called when the UPnP Device discovery has timed out.

Calls _on_discovery_failed.

_on_gateway_response(self, body, loc)

Called with the UPnP device XML description fetched via HTTP.

If the device has suitable services for ip discovery and port mappings, the callback returned in search_device is called with the discovered UPnPDevice.
Parameters:
body - The xml description of the device.
loc - the url used to retreive the xml description
Raises:
UPnPError - When no suitable service has been found in the description, or another error occurs.
